explains: n. 下落，去向，所在之处
adv. 在何处，靠近什么地方
conj. （尤用于某些动词和形容词后，引导表示具体处所的从句）具体在哪里

sentences.en: She enquired as to your whereabouts.
She disclaimed any knowledge of her husband's whereabouts.
sentences.cn: 她否认知道丈夫的下落。

sentences.en: She has refused to reveal the whereabouts of her daughter.
sentences.cn: 她已拒绝透露她女儿的行踪。
